anya-e1001n5:2: Mahājanaṃ yo rañjeti, catūhipi vatthūhi vā;
anya-e1001n5:3: Rājāti vuccate loke, iti sallakkhaye vidvā.
anya-e1001n5:8: Kariyacariyasusaṅgahaṃ bahūnaṃ, anavamatena guṇena yāti saggaṃ;
anya-e1001n5:9: Dānañca peyyavajjañca, atthacariyā ca yā idha;
anya-e1001n5:10: Samānattatā ca dhammesu, tattha tattha yathārahaṃ;
anya-e1001n5:11: Ete kho saṅgahā loke, rathassāṇīva yāyato.
anya-e1001n5:13: Dānaṃ sīlaṃ pariccāgaṃ, ajjavaṃ maddavaṃ tapaṃ;
anya-e1001n5:17: Ekayāmaṃ saye rājā, dviyā maññeva paṇḍito;
anya-e1001n5:20: Aputtakaṃ gharaṃ suññaṃ, raṭṭhaṃ suññaṃ arājakaṃ;
anya-e1001n5:27: Dubbalassa balaṃ rājā, kumārānaṃ rudaṃ balaṃ.
anya-e1001n5:30: Nāyakassa guṇā ete, icchitabbā sataṃ sadā.
anya-e1001n5:33: Sakiṃ sappurisā loke, esa dhammo sanantano.
anya-e1001n5:38: Yo paṇḍito kodhano taṃ na sādhu.
anya-e1001n5:40: Āyaṃ khayaṃ sayaṃ jaññā, katākataṃ sayaṃ jaññā;
anya-e1001n5:43: Mātā puttakataṃ pāpaṃ, sissakataṃ guru tathā;
anya-e1001n5:46: Akkodhena jine kodhaṃ, asādhuṃ sādhunā jine;
anya-e1001n5:57: Na raññā samakaṃ bhuñje, kāmabhogaṃ kudācanaṃ;
anya-e1001n5:61: Na me rājā sakhā hoti, na rājā hoti samako;
anya-e1001n5:62: Eso sāmiko mayhanti, citte niṭṭhaṃ saṇṭhāpaye.
anya-e1001n5:65: Ujuke nātininne ca, na bhaje uccamāsane;
anya-e1001n5:66: Cha dose vajje sevako, aggīva saṃyato tiṭṭhe.
anya-e1001n5:67: Na pacchato na purato, nāpi āsannadūrato;
anya-e1001n5:68: Na kacche nopi paṭivāte, na cāpi oṇatuṇṇate;
anya-e1001n5:69: Ime dose vivajjetvā, ekamantaṃ ṭhitā ahu –
anya-e1001n5:76: Kassako vāṇijo macco, samaṇo sutasīla vā;
anya-e1001n5:82: Mahārukkhassa phalino, āmaṃ chindati yo phalaṃ;
anya-e1001n5:88: Mahārukkhassa phalino, pakkaṃ chindati yo phalaṃ;
